title: the kernel has stopped working
body: i cant go into the launcher... why is that? can any 1 help me please? i really wanna play and cannot :C

replies.body: This error can be due to a setting on your OS that's blocking the patcher from launching.  As a first step, I suggest using our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide which can resolve this for you.  That should get you fixed up, but let me know if you have any questions!
i tried it al... what's next?
